basic_information.scholarship_name: Theresa Sue Evans Scholarship in Real Estate

description: The Theresa Sue Evans Endowed Scholarship in Real Estate is open to full time students with a declared UCO Real Estate minor. Eligibility Requirements Declared UCO Real Estate minor Enrolled full-time Students must provide a statement of work history while enrolled in school Real Estate program director must provide a recommendation Must provide statement of need

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Minor_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor_1_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor_2_2 is Finance-Real Estate
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Minor_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor_1_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor_2_2 is Finance-Real Estate

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
